GK19bahcar2u:0: dvitīya ucchvāsaḥ atimbhīre bhūpe kūpa iva janasya niravatārasya /
GK19bahcar2u:2: rāgiṇi naline lakṣmīṃ divaso nidadhāti dinakaraprabhavām /
GK19bahcar2u:22: pratyagranirjitasyāstamupagatavato vasantasāmantasya bālāpatyeṣviva payaḥpāyiṣu navodyāneṣu darśitasneho mṛdurabhūt /
GK19bahcar2u:28: nidrālasā ratnālokamapi nāsahanta dṛśaḥ, kimuta jaraṭhamātapam /
GK19bahcar2u:29: aśiśirasamayena cakravākamithunābhinanditāḥ sarita iva tanimānamānīyanta soḍupāḥ śarvaryaḥ
GK19bahcar2u:30: abhinavapaṭupāṭalāmodasurabhiparimalaṃ na kevalaṃ jalam, janasya pavanamapi pātumabhūdabhilāṣo divasakarasantāpāt /
GK19bahcar2u:31: krameṇa ca kharakhagamayūkhe khaṇḍitaśaiśave, śuṣyatsarasi, sīdatsretasi,
GK19bahcar2u:43: dāvajanitajagannīrājane, rajanīrājayakṣmaṇi, kaṭhorībhavati nidāghakāle pratidiśamājīkamānā ivoṣareṣu prapāvāṭakuṭīpaṭalaprakaṭaluṇṭhakāḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:52: vanamayūrapicchacayānuccinvantaḥ, saprayāṇaguñjā iva śiñjānajaratkarañjamañjarībījajālakaiḥ saprarīhā ivātapāturavanamahiṣanāsānikuñjasthūlaniḥśvāsaiḥ, sāpatyā
GK19bahcar2u:53_1: iva mahoṣmamuktibhiḥ, lomaśā iva śīryamāṇaśālmaliphalatūlatantubhiḥ, dadruṇā iva śuṣkapatraprakarākṛṣṭibhiḥ, śirālā iva tṛṇaveṇīvikaraṇaiḥ
GK19bahcar2u:53_2: ucchmaśrava iva dhūyamānanavayavaśūkaśakalaśaṅkubhiḥ, daṃṣṭrālā iva calitaśalalasūcīśataiḥ, jihvālā iva vaiśvānaraśikhābhiḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:67: hariṇāḥ, vkacittarutalavivaravivartino babhravaḥ, vkacijjaṭāvalambinaḥ kapilāḥ vkacicchakunikulakulāyapātinaḥ
GK19bahcar2u:76_1: iva gharmaghṛṇim, aghṛṇā iva haṭhahūyamānakaṭhorasthalakamaṭhavasāvisragandhagṛdhnavaḥ, svamapi dhūmamambhodasamudbhūtibhiyeva
GK19bahcar2u:77_0: bahalabālakīṭapaṭalāḥ kakṣeṣu, śvitriṇa iva ploṣavicaṭadvalkaladhavalaśambūkaśuktayaḥ, śuṣkeṣu saraḥsu, svedina iva vilīyamānamadhupaṭalagolagalitamadhūcchiṣṭavṛṣṭayaḥ
GK19bahcar2u:77_1: kānaneṣu, khalataya iva pariśīryamāṇaśikhāsaṃhatayo mahoṣareṣu, gṛhītaśilākavalā iva jvalitasūryamaṇiśakaleṣu śiloccayeṣu,
GK19bahcar2u:78_0: tathābhūte ca tasminnatyūgre grīṣmasamaye kadācidasya svagṛhāvasthitasya bhuktavato 'parāhṇasamaye brātrā pāraśavaścandrasenanāmā
GK19bahcar2u:79_1: bhrātrā kṛṣṇanāmnā bhavatāmantikaṃ prajñātatamo dīrghādhvagaḥ prahito
GK19bahcar2u:89: viśrāntaścābravīt--”eṣa khalu svāminā mānanīyasya lekhaḥ prahitaḥ' iti vimucyā rpayat /
GK19bahcar2u:94: mekhalakastvavādīt--”evamāha medhāvinaṃ svāmī--jānātyeva mānyo yathaikagotratā vā, samānajñānatā vā, samānajātitā vā, sahasaṃvardhanaṃ
GK19bahcar2u:95: vā, ekadeśanivāso vā, darśanābhyāso vā, parasparānurāga, śravaṇaṃ vā,
GK19bahcar2u:96: parokṣopakārakaraṇaṃ vā, samānaśīlatā vā, snehasya hetavaḥ /
GK19bahcar2u:97: tvayi tu vinā kāraṇenādṛṣṭe 'pi pratyāsanne bandhāviva baddhapakṣapātaṃ
GK19bahcar2u:99: yato bhavantamantareṇānyathā cānyathā cāyaṃ cakravartī durjanairgrāhita āsīt /
GK19bahcar2u:100: na ca tattathānasantyeva te yeṣāṃ satāmapi satāṃ na vidyante mitrodāsīnaśatravaḥ /
GK19bahcar2u:102: yatkiñcidasadṛśamudīritam, itaro lokastathaiva tadgṛhṇāti vakti ca /
GK19bahcar2u:103: salilānīva gatānugatikāni lolāni khalu bhavantyavivekināṃ manāṃsi /
GK19bahcar2u:106: vijñaptaścakravartī tvadartham-yathā prāyeṇa prathame vayasi sarvaṃsyaiva cāpalaiḥ śaiśavamaparādhoti
GK19bahcar2u:110: na ca sevārvaṣamyaviṣādinā parameśvaropasarpaṇabhīruṇā vā bhavatā bhavitavyam /
GK19bahcar2u:111: yato yadyapi-- svecchopajātaviṣayo 'pi na yāti vaktuṃ dehauti mārgaṇaśataiśca dadāti duḥkham
GK19bahcar2u:119: tathā ca--asya vimaleṣu sādhuṣu ratnabuddhiḥ, na śilāśakaleṣu /
GK19bahcar2u:124: guṇavati dhanuṣi sahāyabuddhiḥ, na piṇḍopajīvini sevakajane /
GK19bahcar2u:128: sukṛtasaṃsmaraṇopakaraṇaṃ hṛdayam, dharmopakaraṇamāyuḥ, sāhasopakaraṇaṃ śarīram asilatopakaraṇaṃ pṛthivī, vinodopakaraṇaṃ rājakam,
GK19bahcar2u:132: śrutvā ca tameva candrasenaṃ samādiśat--”kṛtakaśipuṃ viśrāntasukhinamenaṃ
GK19bahcar2u:134: atha gate tasmin, paryaste ca vāsare,
GK19bahcar2u:135: saṃghaṭṭamānaraktapaṅkajasaṃpuṭapīyamāna eva kṣayiṇi kṣāmatāṃ vrajati bālavāyasāsyāruṇe 'parāhṇātape, śithilitanijavājijave japāpīḍapāṭalimnyastācalaśikharaskhalite khañjatīva
GK19bahcar2u:136: kamalinīkaṇṭakakṣatapādapallave pataṅge, puraḥ parāpatati preṅkhadandhakāraleśalambālake śaśivirahaśokaśyāma iva śyāmāmukhe,
GK19bahcar2u:144: na ca me tatra pūrvajapuruṣapravartitā prītiḥ, na kulakramāgatā gatiḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:145: nopakārasmaraṇānurodhaḥ, na bālasevāsnehaḥ, na gotragauravam, na
GK19bahcar2u:153: gṛhītākṣamālaḥ, prāsthānikāni sūktāni mantrapadāni ca bahuśaḥ samāvartya
GK19bahcar2u:154: devadevasya virūpākṣasya kṣīrasnapanapuraḥsarāṃ surabhikusumadhūpagandhadhvajabalivilepanapradīpakabahulāṃ vidhāya paramayā bhaktyā pūjām,
GK19bahcar2u:155_1: hutvā, dattvā dyumnaṃ yathāvidyamānaṃ dvijebhyaḥ, pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prāṅmukhīṃ naicikīm,
GK19bahcar2u:158_0: śikhāsaktasiddhārthakaḥ, pituḥ kanīyasyā svasrā mātreva snehārdrahṛdayayā śvetavāsasā sākṣādiva bhagavatyā mahāśvetayā mālatyākhyayā
GK19bahcar2u:158_1: kṛtasakalagamanamaṅgalaḥ, dattāśīrvādo bāndhavavṛddhābhiḥ, abhinanditaḥ parijanajaratībhiḥ vanditacaraṇairabhyanujñāto gurubhiḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:167: tatra ca hṛdayanirviśeṣeṇa bhrātrā suhṛdā ca jagatpatināmnā saṃpāditasaparyaḥ sukhamavasat
GK19bahcar2u:168: athāparedyuruttīrya bhagavatīṃ bhāgīrathīṃ yaṣṭigṛhakanāmni vanagrāmake niśāmanayat /
GK19bahcar2u:171_0: nivartitasnānāśanavyatikaro viśrāntaśca mekhalakena saha yāmamātrāvaśeṣe divase bhuktavati bhūbhuji prakhyātānāṃ kṣitibhujāṃ
GK19bahcar2u:174_3: kramelakakulaiḥ kapilāyamānam, anaytra śarajjaladharairiva sadyaḥsrutapayaḥpaṭaladhavalatanubhiḥ kalpapādapairiva muktāphalajālakajāyamānālokaluptacchāyāmaṇḍalairnārāyaṇanābhipuṇḍarīkairi
GK19bahcar2u:175_1: vivasvataḥ pratāpamāpibadbhirivātapaṃ candralokamayamiva jīvalokaṃ janayadbhiḥ kumudamayamiva kālaṃ kurvadbhirjyotsnāmayamivavāsaraṃ
GK19bahcar2u:175_2: viracayadbhiḥ phenamayīmiva divaṃ darśayadbhirakālakamudīsahasrāṇīvasṛjadbhirupahasadbhiriva śātakratavīṃ śriyaṃ śvetāyamānairātapatrakhaṇḍaiḥ
GK19bahcar2u:176_0: kṣaṇadṛṣṭanaṣṭāṣṭadiṅmukhaṃ ca muṣṇadbhiriva bhuvanamākṣepotkṣepadolāyituṃ dinaṃ gatāgatānīva kārayadbhirutsārayadbhiriva
GK19bahcar2u:176_2: ḥ śaśikararucīnā calatāṃ cāmarāṇāṃ sahasrairdelāyamānam, api ca haṃsayūthāymānaṃ karikarṇaśaṅkheḥ, kalpalatāvanāyamānaṃ kadalikābhiḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:184: cāntarapratīhārāṇāmanumārgapradhānitānekārthijanasahasrāṇāmanuyāyinaḥ puruṣā naśrāntaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ pṛcchadbhiḥ “bhadra! adya bhaviṣyati bhuktvā
GK19bahcar2u:185_0: sthāne dāsyati darśanaṃ parameśvaraḥ, niṣpatiṣyati vā bāhyāṃ kakṣām' iti darśanāśayā divasaṃ nayadbhirbhujanirjitaiḥ śatrumahāsāmantaiḥ
GK19bahcar2u:185_2: ekāntopaviṣṭaiśca jainairārhataiḥ pāśupataiḥ pārāśaribhirvarṇibhiḥ sarvadeśajanmabhiśca janapadaiḥ sarvāmbhodhivelāvanavalayavāsibhiśca
GK19bahcar2u:190_0: abhavaccāsya jātavismayasya manasi--”kathamivedamiyatpramāṇaṃ prāṇijātaṃ janayatāṃ prajāsṛjāṃ nāsītpariśramaḥ, mahābhūtānāṃ
GK19bahcar2u:190_1: vā parikṣayaḥ, paramāṇū nāṃ vā vicchedaḥ, kālasya vāntaḥ, āyuṣo vā vyuparamaḥ, ākṛtīnāṃ vā parisamāptiḥ' iti /
GK19bahcar2u:197_0: himaśailaśilāviśālavakṣasā, haravṛṣakakudakūṭavikaṭāṃsataṭena, urasā capalahṛṣīkahariṇakulasaṃyamanapāśamiva hāraṃ bibhratā,
GK19bahcar2u:197_1: “kathayataṃ yadi somavaṃśasaṃbhavaḥ sūryavaśasaṃbhavo vā bhūpatirabhūdevaṃvidhaḥ' iti praṣṭumānītābhyāṃ somasūryābhyāmiva
GK19bahcar2u:198_1: dīrghayā dṛṣṭyā dūrādevānandayatā, naiṣṭhuryādhiṣṭhāne 'pi pratiṣṭhitena pade pade
GK19bahcar2u:199: praśrayamivāvanamreṇa, maulinā pāṇḍuramuṣṇīṣamudvahatā, vāmena sthūlamuktāphalacchuraṇadanturatsaruṃ karakisalayena kalayatā kṛpāṇam,
GK19bahcar2u:200_0: itareṇāpanītataralatāṃ tāḍinīmiva latāṃ śāta kaumbhīṃ vetrayaṣṭimunmṛṣṭāṃ dhārayatā puruṣeṇānugamyamāno nirgatyāvocat--”eṣa
GK19bahcar2u:200_1: khalu mahāpratīhārāṇāmanantaraścakṣuṣyo devasya pāriyātranāmā dauvārikaḥ samanugṛhṇātvenamanurūpayā pratipattyā kalyāṇābhiniveśī'
GK19bahcar2u:201: dauvārikastu samupasṛtya kṛtapraṇāmo madhurayā girā savinayamabhāṣata--
GK19bahcar2u:205: bāṇastu “dhanyo 'smi, yadevamanugrāhyaṃ māṃ devo manyate' ityuktvā tenopadiśyamānamārgaḥ prāviśadabhyantaram
GK19bahcar2u:206: atha vanāyujaiḥ, āraṭṭajaiḥ, bhāradvājaiḥ, sindhudeśajaiḥ, pārasīkaiśca,
GK19bahcar2u:218: dūrvārasaśyāmalaphenalavaśabalān daśanagṛhītamuktān pharapharitatvacaḥ kaṇḍūjuṣaḥ pradeśān prajālayadbhiḥ, sālasavalitavāladhibhiḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:227_0: puraḥpūjitābhimatadaivataiḥ, bhūpālavallabhaisturaṅgairāracitāṃ mandurāṃ vilokayan, kutūhalākṣiptahṛdayaḥ kiñcidantaramatikrānto
GK19bahcar2u:227_1: hastavāmenātyuccatayā niravakāśamivākāśaṃ kurvāṇam, mahatā kadalīvanena parivṛtaparyantaṃ sarvato madhukaramayībhirmadasrutibhirnadībhirivāpatantībhirāpūryamāṇam,
GK19bahcar2u:228: āśāmukhavisarpiṇā bakulavanānāmiva vikasatāmāmodeva limpantaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ dūrādavyaktamibhadhiṣṇyāgāramapaśyat
GK19bahcar2u:230: asāvakathayat--”eṣa khalu devasyaupavāhyo vāhyaṃ hṛdayaṃ jātyantarita ātmā
GK19bahcar2u:231: bahiścarāḥ prāṇā vikramakrīḍāsuhṛddarpaśāta iti yathārthanāmā vāraṇapatiḥ
GK19bahcar2u:233: sa tamavādīt--”bhadra! śrūyate darpaśātaḥ yadyevamadoṣo vā paśyāmi tāvadvāraṇendrameva
GK19bahcar2u:240: gatvā ca taṃ pradeśaṃ dūrādeva gabhbhīragalagarjitairviyati cātakakadambakairbhuvi ca bhavananīlakaṇṭhakulaiḥ kalakekākalakalamukharamukhaiḥ kriyamāṇākālakolāhalam,
GK19bahcar2u:245: brahnastambhamiva sthūlaniśitadantena karapatreṇa pāṭayantam, amāntaṃ bhuvanābyantare bahiriva
GK19bahcar2u:246_3: kakubhāṃ cakravālam, ekaṃ karāntarārpitenotpalāśena kadalīdaṇḍenāntargataśīkarasicyamānamūlam, muktapallavamivāparaṃ līlāvalambinā
GK19bahcar2u:247: dantamāṇḍamudvahantam, visarpantyā ca dantakāṇḍayugalasya kāntyā saraḥkrīḍāsvā ditāni kumudavanānīva bahudhā vamantam, nijayaśorāśimiva
GK19bahcar2u:250: hastakāṇḍadaṇḍoddharaṇalīlāsu ca lakṣyamāṇena raktāṃśukasukumāratareṇa tālunā kavalitāni raktapajhavanānīva
GK19bahcar2u:252_2: sarvakānanāni karipatīnām, aviralodabindusyandinā himaśilāśakalamayena vibhramanakṣatramālāguṇena śiśirīkriyamāṇam,
GK19bahcar2u:254: muhurmuhuḥ sthagitāpāvṛtadiṅmukhābyāṃ karṇatālatālavṛntābhyāṃ vījayantamiva bhartṛbhaktyā dantaparyaṅkikāsthitāṃ rājalakṣmīm,
GK19bahcar2u:255: āyatavaṃśakramāgatena gajādhipatyacihnena cāmareṇeva calatā vāladhinā virājamānam, svacchaśiśiraśīkaracchalena digvijayapītāḥ sarita iva punaḥpunarmukhena muñcantam,
GK19bahcar2u:263: mūrcchantamiva madena, truṭyantamiva tāruṇyena, dravantamiva dānena,
GK19bahcar2u:264: valgantamiva balena, mādyantamiva mānena, udyantamivotsāhena, tāmyantamiva
GK19bahcar2u:265: tejasā, limpantamiva lāvaṇyena, siñcantamiva saubhāgyena, snigdhaṃ
GK19bahcar2u:266: nakheṣu, paruṣaṃ romaviṣaye, guruṃ mukhe, sacchiṣyaṃ vinaye, mṛduṃ śirasi,
GK19bahcar2u:267: dṛḍhaṃ paricayeṣu, hrasvaṃ skandhabandhe, dīrghamāyuṣi, daridramudare,
GK19bahcar2u:269: jinaṃ kṣamāsu, vahnivarṣaṃ krodhamokṣeṣu, garuḍhaṃ nāgoddhṛtiṣu, nāradaṃ
GK19bahcar2u:282: śilīmukhaśatajhāṅkāritaṃ pārijātapādapaṃ bhūnandanasya, tathā ca saṃgītagṛhaṃ karṇatālatāṇḍavānām, āpānamaṇḍapaṃ madhupamaṇḍalānām,
GK19bahcar2u:287: āsīccāsya cetasi--”nūnamasya, nirmāṇe girayo grāhitāḥ paramāṇutām /
GK19bahcar2u:290: vindhyasya dantāvādivarāhasya karaḥ' iti vismayamānamevaṃ dauvāriko
GK19bahcar2u:293: āyātaḥ kathamapyayaṃ smṛtipathaṃ śūnyībhavaccetasāṃ nāgendraḥ sahate na mānasagatānāśāgajendrānapi
GK19bahcar2u:296: paśya tāvaddevam' ityabhidhīyamānaśca tena madajalapaṅkilakapolapaṭṭapatitāṃ mattāmiva madaparimalena mukulitāṃ kathamapi tasmād dṛṣṭimākṛṣya tenaiva dauvārikeṇopadiśyamānavartmā
GK19bahcar2u:297_0: samatikramya bhūpālakulasahasrasaṃkṛlāni trīṇi kakṣāntarāṇi caturthe muktāsthānamaṇḍapasya purastādajire sthitam, dūrādūrdhvasthitena
GK19bahcar2u:297_1: prāṃśūnā karṇikāragaureṇa vyāyāmavyāyatavapuṣā śastriṇā maulena śarīraparivārakalokena paṅktisthitena kārtasvarastambhamaṇḍaleneva
GK19bahcar2u:298_0: parivṛtam, āsannopaviṣṭaviśiṣṭeṣṭalokam, haricandanarasaprakṣālite tuṣāraśīkaraśītalatale dantapāṇḍurapāde śaśimaya iva muktāśailaśilāpaṭṭaśayane
GK19bahcar2u:298_1: samupaviṣṭam, śayanīyaparyantavinyaste samarpitasakalavigrahabhāraṃ bhuje, diṅmukhavisarpiṇi dehaprabhāvitāne vitatamaṇimayūkhe
GK19bahcar2u:298_2: gharmasamayasubhage sarasīva mṛdumṛṇālajālajaṭilajale sarājakaṃ ramamāṇam, tejasaḥ paramāṇubhiriva kevarlarnirmitam,
GK19bahcar2u:303: sakalabhūpālaparityaktena bhīteneva labdhavācā sarvātmanā satyena sevyamānam,
GK19bahcar2u:308: ābharaṇamaṇikiraṇaprabhājālajāyamānānīndradhanuḥsahasrāṇīndraprābhṛtaprahitāni vilabhamānamiva rājñāṃ saṃbhāṣaṇeṣu parityaktamapi madhu varṣaṃntam,
GK19bahcar2u:309_0: kāvyakathāsvapītamapyamṛtamudvamantam, visrambhabhāṣiteṣvanākṛṣṭamapi hṛdayaṃ darśayantam, prasādeṣu niścalāmapi śriyaṃ śthāne
GK19bahcar2u:310_0: raṇaśriyaḥ śṛṇvantam, atikrāntasubhaṭakalahālāpeṣu snehavṛṣṭimiva dṛṣṭimiṣṭe kṛpāṇe pātayantam, parihāsasmiteṣu gurupratāpabhītasya
GK19bahcar2u:311_0: sakalalokahṛdayasthitamapi nyāye tiṣṭhantam, agocare guṇānāmabhūmau saubhāgyānāmaviṣaye varapradānānāmaśakya āśiṣāmamārge
GK19bahcar2u:311_1: manorathānāmatidūre daivasyādiśyupamānānāmasādhye dharmasyādṛṣṭapūrve lakṣmyā mahattve sthitam, aruṇapādapallavena sugatamantharoruṇā
GK19bahcar2u:312: prasannāvalokitena candramukhena kṛṣṇakeśena vapuṣā sarvadevatāvatāramivaikatra darśayantam, api ca māṃsalamayūkhamālāmalinitamahītale mahati mahārhe
GK19bahcar2u:313: māṇikyamālāmaṇḍitamekhale mahānīlamaye pādapīṭhe kalikālaśirasīva salīlaṃ vinyastavāmacaraṇam, ākrāntakāliyaphaṇācakavālaṃ bālamiva puṇḍarīkākṣam,
GK19bahcar2u:314: kṣaumapāṇḍureṇa caraṇanakhadodhitipratānena prasaratā mahīṃ mahādevīpaṭṭabandheneva mahimānamāropayantam,
GK19bahcar2u:318_1: vāsukinirmokeṇeva mandaraṃ dyotamānam, aghanena satārāgaṇenoparikṛtena dvitīyāmbareṇa
GK19bahcar2u:323_2: diśāṃ dikpālānāṃ ca yugapadāyatimapaharantam, sodaryalakṣmīcumbanalobhena kaustubhamaṇeriva mukhāvayavatāṃ gatasyādharasya
GK19bahcar2u:324: pārijātapallavaraseneva siñcantaṃ diṅmukhāni, antarāntarā suhṛtparihāsasmitaiḥ prakīryamāṇavimaladaśanaśikhāpratānaiḥ
GK19bahcar2u:330_0: vimalakapolaphalakapratibimbatāṃ cāmaragrāhiṇīṃ vigrahiṇīmiva mukhanivāsinīṃ sarasvatīṃ dadhānam, aruṇena cūḍāmaṇiśociṣā
GK19bahcar2u:333: parikalitakeśāntam, śikhaṇḍābharaṇabhuvā muktāphalālokena marakatamaṇikiraṇakalāpena cānyonyasaṃvalanavṛjinena prayāgapravāhaveṇikāvāriṇevāgatya svayamabhiṣicyamānam,
GK19bahcar2u:335_0: hṛdayamiva haṭhātpraveśayantībhiḥ prabhāmucāmābharaṇamaṇīnāṃ mayūkhaiḥ prasāritairbahubhiriva bāhubirāliṅgantībhirjṛ mbhānubandhabandhuravadanāravindāvaraṇīkṛtairuttānaiḥ
GK19bahcar2u:337_0: sparśasvinnavepamānakarakisalayagalitacaraṇāravindāṃ caraṇagrāhiṇīṃ vihasya koṇenalīlālasaṃ śirasi tāḍayantam, anavaratakarakalitakoṇatayā
GK19bahcar2u:337_1: cātmanaḥ priyāṃ vīṇāmiva śriyamapi śikṣayantam, niḥsneha iti dhanaiḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:338: anāśrayaṇīya iti doṣaiḥ, nigraharuciritīndriyaiḥ, durupasarpa iti kalinā,
GK19bahcar2u:339: nīrasa iti vyasanaiḥ, bhīrurityayaśasā, durgrahacittavṛttiriti cittabhuvā,
GK19bahcar2u:340: strīpara iti sarasvatyā, ṣaṇḍha iti parakalatraiḥ, kāṣṭhāmuniriti
GK19bahcar2u:341: yatibhiḥ, dhūrta iti veśyābhiḥ, neya iti suhṛdbhiḥ, karmakara iti vipraiḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:355: sarvaprajāpatīnām, gambhīraṃ ca, prasannaṃ ca, trāsajananaṃ ca, ramaṇīyaṃ
GK19bahcar2u:356: ca, kautukajananaṃ ca, puṇyaṃ ca, cakravarttinaṃ harṣamadrākṣīt /
GK19bahcar2u:357: dṛṣṭvā cānugṛhīta iva nigṛhīta iva sābhilāṣa iva tṛpta iva romāñcamucā mukhena muñcannānandabāṣpavāribindūndūrādeva
GK19bahcar2u:362: nāsyahareriva vṛṣavirodhīni bālacaritāni, na paśupateriva dakṣajanodvegakārīṇyeśvayavilāsatāni, na śatakratoriva gautravināśapiśunāḥ
GK19bahcar2u:363: pravādāḥ na yamasyevātivallabhāni daṇḍagrahaṇāni, na varuṇasyeva nistriṃśagrāhasahasrarakṣitā ratnālayāḥ, na dhanadasyeva niṣphalāḥ
GK19bahcar2u:364: sannidhilābhāḥ, na jinasyevārthavādaśūnyāni darśanāni, na candramasa iva
GK19bahcar2u:367: api cāsya tyāgasyārthinaḥ, prajñāyāḥ śāstrāṇi, kavitvasya vācaḥ, sattvasya
GK19bahcar2u:369: lokahṛdayāni, guṇagaṇasya saṃkhyā, kauśalasya kalā, na paryāpto viṣayaḥ /
GK19bahcar2u:370: asmiṃśca rājani yatīnāṃ yogapaṭṭakāḥ, pustakarmaṇāṃ pārthivavigṛhāḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:378: rājā tu tacchru tvā dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ giriguhāgatasiṃhabṛṃhitagambhīreṇa svareṇa pūrayanniva nabhobhāgamapṛcchat--”eṣa sa bāṇaḥ?' iti /
GK19bahcar2u:380: so 'yam' iti vijñāpito dauvārikeṇa “na tāvadenamakṛtaprasādaḥ paśyāmi' iti tiryaṅnīladhavalāṃśukadhārāṃ
GK19bahcar2u:381: bhramayannapāṅganīyamānataralatārakasyāyāminīṃ cakṣuṣaḥ prabhāṃ parivṛtya preṣṭhasya pṛṣṭhato niṣaṇṇasya mālavarājasūnorakathayat--”mahānayaṃ
GK19bahcar2u:383: tūṣṇīṃbhāvena tvagamitanarendravacasi tasminmūke ca rājaloke muhūrtamiva tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā bāṇo vyajñāpayat--”deva! avijñātatattva iva, aśraddadhāna
GK19bahcar2u:384: iva, neya iva, aviditalokavṛttānta iva ca kasmādevamājñāpayasi? svairiṇo vicitrāśca lokasya svabhāvāḥ pravādāśca /
GK19bahcar2u:396_0: idānīṃ tu sugata iva śāntamanasi manāviva kartari varṇāśramavyavasthānāṃ samavartinīva ca sākṣāddaṇḍabhṛti deve śāsati saptāmburāśiraśanāśeṣadvīpamālinīṃ
GK19bahcar2u:396_1: mahīṃ ka ivāviśaṅkaḥ sarvavyasanabandhoravinyasya manasāpyabhinayaṃ kalpayiṣyati /
GK19bahcar2u:401: śarāravo 'pi sānukrośā iva śvāpadagaṇāḥ piśitāni bhuñjate /
GK19bahcar2u:402: sarvathā kālena māṃ jñāsyati svāmī svayameva /
GK19bahcar2u:408: astābhilāṣiṇi ca lambamāne savitari visarjitarājaloko 'bhyantaraṃ prāviśat
GK19bahcar2u:410: āstācalakūṭakirīṭe niculamañjarībhāṃsi tejāṃsi muñcati viyanmuci marīcimālini,
GK19bahcar2u:412_1: divasavihṛtipratyāgataṃ prasrutastanaṃ stanandhaye dhayati dhenuvargamudgatakṣoraṃ kṣudhitatarṇakavrāte, krameṇa cāstadharādharadhātudhunīpūraplāvita
GK19bahcar2u:413_0: sandhyāsindhupānapātre pātaṅge maṇḍale, kaṇaṇḍalujalaśuciśayacaraṇeṣu caityapraṇatipareṣu pārāśariṣu, yajñapātrapavitrapāṇau
GK19bahcar2u:415_0: munikarasahasraprakīrṇasandhyāvandanodabindunikara iva danturayati tārāpathasthalīṃ sthavīyasi tārakānikurambe ambarāśrayiṇi
GK19bahcar2u:415_1: śarvarīśabarīśikhaṇḍe khaṇḍaparaśukaṇṭhakāle kavalayati bāle jyotiḥ śeṣaṃ
GK19bahcar2u:417_0: ararasampuṭasaṃkrīḍanakathitāvṛttiṣviva gopureṣu, śayanopajoṣajuṣi jaratīkathitakathe śikhayiṣamāṇe śiśujane, jaranmahiṣamaṣīmalīmasatamasi
GK19bahcar2u:422: viralobhavati varaṭānāṃ veśantaśāyinīnāṃ mañjuni mañjīraśiñjitajaḍe jalpite, nidrāvidrāṇadrāghīyasi drāvayatīva ca virahihṛdayāni
GK19bahcar2u:423: sārasarasite, bhāvivāsaravījāṅkuranikara iva ca vikīryamāṇe jagati pradīpaprakare nivāsasthānamagāt
GK19bahcar2u:426: yadyahamakṣigataḥ syām na me darśanena prasādaṃ kuryāt /
GK19bahcar2u:428: upadiśanti hi vinayamanurūpapratipattyupapādanena vācā vināpi bhartavyānāṃ svāminaḥ /
GK19bahcar2u:429: api ca ghiṅmāṃ svadoṣāndhamānasamanādarapīḍitamevamatiguṇavati rājanyanyathā cānyathā ca cintayantam
GK19bahcar2u:430: sarvathā tathā karomi, yathā yathāvasthitaṃ jānāti māmayaṃ kālena'
GK19bahcar2u:431: ityevamavadhārya cāparedyurniṣkramya kaṭakātsuhṛdāṃ bāndhavānāṃ ca bhavaneṣu tāvadatiṣṭhat, yāvadasyasvayameva gṛhītasvabhāvaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GK19bahcar2u:434: svalpaireva cāhobhiḥ paramaprītena prasādajanmano mānasya premṇo visrambhasya draviṇasya narmaṇaḥ prabhāvasya ca parāṃ koṭimānīyata narendreṇeti /
GK19bahcar2u:435: iti śrīmahākavibāṇabhaṭṭakṛte harṣañcarite rājadarśanaṃ nāma dvitīya ucchvāsaḥ /
